iainsaun.trophyhunter.notchchance.title: Trophy Notch Chance
iainsaun.trophyhunter.notchchance.toolti: Likelihood that you'll get a yellow trophy notch in the fishing mini game.
iainsaun.trophyhunter.baitnotchchance.to: Likelihood that you'll get a yellow trophy notch in the fishing mini game when using bait.
iainsaun.trophyhunter.catchnum.title: Fish caught between trophies
iainsaun.trophyhunter.catchnum.tooltip: Minimum number of fish to catch before you can catch another trophy.
